questions.quote: Huh. Well, it all sounds pretty good. There's only one flaw in it: They're roommates. She'd have to go out with me behind Sandy's back. She's not gonna do that.
No, no. Cinqo de Mayo.  Yeah, Marcellino, he turned me on to it, and he's one sixty-fourth Mayan.
Gino, you've outdone yourself this time. This is the best haircut I've ever had.
Hey, I had the show of my life last night. I ad-libbed like ten new minutes.
Well, obviously, we all know each other very well,  I'm sure that we'll all feel comfortable within the confines of the honor system.
Shut up. Spread 'em. I said spread 'em!  You're in big trouble son. Burglary, grand larceny, possession of stolen goods... and uh, uh... murder.
I told them I have a place in the Hamptons. What did you say?
who do you think she is? how dare she? you want me to get the manager? too bad they don't have those old ladies walking around with flashlights anymore we'd flush her out
Almost. Couldn't get the girl go out with me the second time.
Are you kidding? People get spaces this good, they never give 'em up.
